coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttackHead] Deal (40% of this Coin's final damage) Slash damage

levelList.name: Sever
levelList.desc:
Cannot change target
Final Power +1 for every 10 [CutbondRyoshu] on self (max 3)
Final Power +1 for every 6 [Laceration] on target (max 3)
levelList.flavor: 'I cannot let Araya live a life like my own. She must lead a new life away from this place, away from me.'

levelList.name: Paint
levelList.desc:
Cannot change target
Final Power +1 for every 10 [CutbondRyoshu] on self (max 3)
Final Power +1 for every 6 [Laceration] on target (max 3)
levelList.flavor:
'We will escape the House of Spiders...'

'Before Araya meets the same fate as Saru.'

levelList.name: Splatter
levelList.desc:
Cannot change target
Random chance to delete the earliest Coin on the Skill this unit Clashed with
Final Power +1 for every 10 [CutbondRyoshu] on self (max 5)
Final Power +1 for every 6 [Laceration] on target (max 4)
levelList.flavor: 'But I cannot guarantee Araya's safety while fighting off the Nursefathers' pursuit.'

levelList.name: Brushstroke
levelList.desc:
Cannot change target
Random chance to delete the earliest Coin on the Skill this unit Clashed with
Final Power +1 for every 10 [CutbondRyoshu] on self (max 5)
Final Power +1 for every 6 [Laceration] on target (max 4)
levelList.flavor:
'I will hide her. I will hide her right under their noses—in that room full of Time Vaults where they're always coming and going.'

'Time Vaults are safe. I can put Araya in one of those.'

levelList.name: Slay the Heavens - Tiansha [天殺]
levelList.desc:
Cannot change target
Random chance to delete the earliest Coin on the Skill this unit Clashed with
Final Power +1 for every 4 [CutbondRyoshu] on self (max 12)
levelList.flavor:
'And then, I will make a small mark on Araya's safe with my blade.'

'That way, when I return, the mark made by my sword will become fresh again and I'll be able to pick out hers even if the Vaults get shuffled around.'

'The best place to hide a tree is in the forest.'

levelList.name: 'Erasing Me, Erasing You.'
levelList.desc:
Cannot change target
Random chance to delete the earliest Coin on the Skill this unit Clashed with
levelList.flavor: 'However much time slips by, I hope it feels like only a fleeting moment to her.'
